description: Grafana Dashboard for JMeter Performance Monitoring

targets.query: SELECT sum("count")  FROM "$Measurement" WHERE ("application" =~ /^$Application$/ AND "transaction" = 'all') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("countError") FROM "$Measurement" WHERE ("transaction" = 'all' AND "application" =~ /^$Application$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("count") / $Interval FROM "$Measurement" WHERE ("transaction" = 'all' AND "application" =~ /^$Application$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("maxAT") FROM "$Measurement" WHERE ("transaction" = 'internal' AND "application" =~ /^$Application$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("rb") FROM "$Measurement" WHERE ("transaction" = 'all' AND "application" =~ /^$Application$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("sb") FROM "$Measurement" WHERE ("transaction" = 'all' AND "application" =~ /^$Application$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("pct95.0") FROM "$Measurement" WHERE ("application" =~ /^$Application$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "transaction", time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("meanAT") FROM "$Measurement" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("countError") FROM "$Measurement" WHERE ("transaction" = 'all' AND "application" =~ /^$Application$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("sb") FROM "$Measurement" WHERE ("application" =~ /^$Application$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "transaction", time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("rb") FROM "$Measurement" WHERE ("application" =~ /^$Application$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "transaction", time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("count") / $Interval FROM "$Measurement" WHERE ("transaction" =~ /^$Transaction$/ AND "statut" = 'ok') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT sum("count") FROM "$Measurement" WHERE ("application" =~ /^$Application$/ AND "transaction" =~ /^$Transaction$/ AND "statut" = 'all') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("count") FROM "$Measurement" WHERE ("application" =~ /^$Application$/ AND "transaction" =~ /^$Transaction$/ AND "statut" = 'ko') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("avg") FROM "$Measurement" WHERE ("transaction" =~ /^$Transaction$/ AND "statut" = 'ok') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT last("pct50.0") FROM "$Measurement" WHERE ("transaction" =~ /^$Transaction$/ AND "statut" = 'ok') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT last("pct90.0") FROM "$Measurement" WHERE ("transaction" =~ /^$Transaction$/ AND "statut" = 'ok') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("pct95.0") FROM "$Measurement" WHERE ("transaction" =~ /^$Transaction$/ AND "statut" = 'ok') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("pct99.0") FROM "$Measurement" WHERE ("transaction" =~ /^$Transaction$/ AND "statut" = 'ok') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("max") FROM "$Measurement" WHERE ("transaction" =~ /^$Transaction$/ AND "statut" = 'ok') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT  count("responseTime")/$AggregationInterval FROM "raw_transaction" WHERE $timeFilter  GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT count("responseTime")/$AggregationInterval FROM "raw_transaction" WHERE "label" !~ /^SCRIPT/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "label", time([[AggregationInterval]]s) fill(null)
SELECT mean("meanAT")  FROM "jmeter" WHERE  $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[AggregationInterval]]s) fill(null)
SELECT mean("responseTime") FROM "raw_transaction" WHERE  "label" !~ /^SCRIPT/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[AggregationInterval]]s), label
SELECT mean("latency") FROM "raw_transaction" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[AggregationInterval]]s), label
SELECT mean("connectTime") FROM "raw_transaction" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[AggregationInterval]]s), label

list.name: Application
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "jmeter" WITH KEY = "application"

list.name: Transaction
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "jmeter" WITH KEY = "transaction" WHERE "application" =~ /^$Application$/ AND "transaction" != 'internal' AND "transaction" != 'all'

title: JMeter Dashboard
